column1: The air grows cold... {monster_name} emerges from the shadows!
A terrifying roar echoes... {monster_name} blocks your path!
From the depths of the dungeon
Beware! The guardian of this floor
Oh no! It's {monster_name}! What will you do?!
{monster_name} is here... and it doesn't look happy.
A dreadful foe stands before you: {monster_name}... Prepare for battle!
A new challenge awaits! You face the mighty {monster_name}!
